name: Magento2-cat-widget
tagline: List categories by url_key on any CMS page.
body:
## Category List Widget for Magento 2.
List categories by url_key on any CMS page.

### Features
* Add Category List Any Where
* Automatic Pick Default Store Category as Parent
* Category Image into List
* Can Manage Image Size
* Can Assign Custom Parent Category

### Authors and Contributors
Thanks to Christine Cardoso @christinecardoso, and Michael Salafia @michaelsalafia for developing this extension and sharing it with the Magento community. This project is brought to you by Digimix [Magento 2 Developers NYC](https://digimix.co). 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this extension? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/digimix/magento2-cat-widget) or [report an issue](https://github.com/digimix/magento2-cat-widget/issues) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
